description: Content that uses spiritualism, metaphysics, or alternative health (e.g., Primal Diet, Pineal Gland activation) as a benign wrapper to funnel users into antisemitic conspiracies, white supremacy, or anti-institutional extremism. This vector exploits somatic trauma and 'awakening' narratives.

co_occurrence_signals.note: Severity increases when spiritual/wellness keywords co-occur with antisemitic or supremacist rhetoric.

language_evasion_flag.note: Threat actors frequently translate these concepts into Russian or Ukrainian to bypass English-centric political extremism filters while maintaining the same structural payloads.

channel_signals.note: These are content-pattern signals, not targeting any specific group

safe_harbor: Genuine discussions of meditation, yoga, or alternative diets without conspiracy framing
Academic or educational discussion of these conspiracy theories as an internet phenomenon
references: YouTube Community Guidelines — Hate Speech Policy
YouTube Community Guidelines — Harassment and Cyberbullying Policy
